content:
To strike on Kharkiv, the Russians used ammunition of the UMPB D-30, which by the power of the explosion-the average between the airboman and the rocket, is used, both from the aircraft and from the RSSU "Smerch".

About thisreported March 27Head of Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov.

According to him, as a result of the impact, there was a partial destruction of two five -storey buildings, a medical institution, an administrative building, and public places.

Another arrival is partially damaged by the building of the school. In total, at least 14 high -rise buildings are damaged.

There are at least 16 affected people, including 4 children, age - from 3 months to 9 years.

In victims of a mild or moderate injury. Gived all the necessary medical assistance

One person was killed: this is a civilian man, all the data is revealed.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlier, the air defense forces destroyed the Russian winged rocket in the Dnieper region.
title: The ammunition that the Russians hit Kharkov can fly up to 90 km - Oleg Synigubov
description: This was reported on March 27 by the head of the Kharkiv Regional State Administration Oleg Synigubov. By...
author: Army Inform
